Guido Stein  1 2020 Guido Stein  
 
Age:  53 
Civil Status:  Married, two children  
Nationality:  German  
Education:  Applied Physics / Physical Engineering  
Attended various application, information system and computer 
system training courses.  Executive management training, consultative 
selling & breakthrough performance as well as 6sigma  
 
 
Professional Employment:  
 
2018 – inmation Software GmbH  
 
Managing Director, Chief Sales and Marketing Officer   
 
inmation is new player in the field of digital transformation. inmation has 
already global contracts with majors like BASF and Bayer in place enabling 
seamless global digitalization.  
 
• Establish Sales Structure for startup  
• Investor relationships  
• Building and manage global partner network – about 10 partners

2018 – inmation Software GmbH  
 
Managing Director, Chief Sales and Marketing Officer   
 
inmation is new player in the field of digital transformation. inmation has 
already global contracts with majors like BASF and Bayer in place enabling

• Establish Sales Structure for startup  
• Investor relationships  
• Building and manage global partner network – about 10 partners  
• Lead large corporate pursuits including BASF, Bayer, Boehringer Ingelheim, 
Suncor, Nestl é 
 
2016 – Kellogg, Brown & Root GmbH  
 
Director  Business Development Europe and CIS   
 
• Build and lead Sales Team in the region  
• Focus on process license sales in Refining and Chemicals  
• Develop revamp opportunities in the relevant verticals  
• Lead grass -root opportunities  including design and build of new Solvent 
Deasphalting in Europe  
• Economic justification, design and implementation of various revamps for of 
FCC units  
• Revamp of ammonia plants  
• Revamps and build of new acid purification and concentration units  
 
2010 – Hone ywell / Matrikon  
 
Honeywell Process Solutions – Director Strategic Corporate Accounts  
 
• Grow global business with key Chemical  account, like BASF  
• Build senior relationships within customer on all relevant levels  
• Ensure global consistency in commercial terms and delivery model  
• Share best practices globally  
• Guide local account managers in line with overall strategy  
• Lead on Greenfield pursuits  in Asia and Americas  
• Qualify broader Honeywell portfolio to enable further growth  
• Drive technology enha ncements in line with customer/market needs  
• Establish common procedures and constituent CRM usage  
 
Guido Stein  2 2020  
Honeywell Advanced  Solutions  – Director Lifecycle Solutions  
 
Responsible for Advanced Solutions Global Lifecycle Solutions, including:  
 
▪ Global Software Support – Benefit Guardianship Program  
▪ Aftermarket Sales for  
▪ Build Sales Force  
▪ Technology upgrades  
▪ Consulting services  
▪ Enhanced Support Programs  
▪ Key strategic Alliances with SAP and Accenture  
▪ Sponsor for key global accounts Du Pont, BASF, Bayer,  LyondellBasell  etc. 
 
Matrikon - Director European Operations   
 
▪ Profit/Loss responsibility for European  Operations  
▪ Honeywell Integration  
▪ Sponsor for selected Matrikon/Honeywell Strategic Corporate Accounts  
▪ Corporate licensing and technology deployme nt programs for BASF, 
Lyondel Base ll, DuPont, Shell , Bayer , MOL, etc.  
 
 
2005 - Invensys Systems GmbH, Mannheim Germany  
 
General Manager EMEA - Invensys Wonderware Mobility  
 
Initial Objectives prior acquisition by Wonderware:  
▪ Build SAT’s EMEA presence  
▪ Found Company  
▪ Build direct Sales Team and Sales Consulting  
▪ Identify and pursue IntelaTrac business with strategic key accounts  
▪ Enhance Partner business through EMEA partners  
▪ Build Microsoft, SAP, Motorola and Econ partnerships  
 
Objectives followin g Wonderware acquisition:  
▪ Mange Honeywell relationship  
▪ IPS/IOM Sales Ramp -up 
▪ Project Sponsor for ongoing IntelaTrac implantation in EMEA  
▪ Identify and pursue IntelaTrac business with strategic key accounts  
▪ Enhance Partner business through EMEA partners  
▪ Expa nd Microsoft, SAP, Motorola and Econ partnerships  
 
 
Vice President Solutions Sales EMEA   
 
Strategic goals:  
▪ Build higher margin business in established Invensys hardware dominated 
accounts by selling  
▪ Process Simulation – SimSci  
▪ Dynamic Simulation offerings including Operator Trainer Systems  
▪ Advanced Process Control and Real Time Optimisation  
▪ Manufacturing Execution Systems  
▪ Offsites Automation and Blending Solutions  
▪ Integrated offerings specific to industries  
▪ Consulting Services  
Guido Stein  3 2020 ▪ Suppo

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
